title: You A Hard G? Trump Vs Snakes 2.26.20
itunes:title: You A Hard G? Trump Vs Snakes 2.26.20
description:
In episode 577, Jack and Miles are joined by rapper P.O.S. aka Stefon Alexander to discuss Jif peanut butter working with GIPHY, what Joe Biden is up to before the Democratic debates, Dr. Ronny “PILLZ” Jackson running for office, the Supreme Court making it harder for poor immigrants to enter the country, the IOC possibly canceling the Olympics due to the Coronavirus, Harvey Weinstein having chest pains after verdict, Netflix giving us a top ten, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Iffy on the pronunciation of GIF? Jif peanut butter is here to help
  2. Here @JoeBiden says to the crowd in South Carolina that he is "running for the United States Senate" and that if they don't like him they can "vote for the other Biden."
  3. Trump’s Doctor Thought He Had a Ticket to Congress. It Hasn’t Been So Easy.
  4. Supreme Court Lets Trump Enforce Policy Against Poor Immigrants
  5. Exclusive: Trump's "Deep State" hit list
  6. IOC member casts doubt on postponing or moving Tokyo Games
  7. Coronavirus updates: US warned of possible outbreak, Italy locks down
  8. Harvey Weinstein taken to hospital after feeling chest pains and having heart palpitations, attorney says
  9. Netflix rolls out Top 10 feature to help show what people are actually watching
  10. WATCH: P.O.S - “Faded” (Official Music Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
